title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions              Current Conditions          Alerts    Information        Recent Flash Flooding  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Recent Flash Flooding  Heavy rains Aug 3-5 caused flash flooding with debris on the main entrance road. Park staff has cleared all roads, but more heavy rain is possible in August on already saturated soils. Watch for stray rocks and debris, and never drive into debris flows. more                   Live Webcam View            Medano Creek Current Conditions and Forecast Flow           Park and Preserve Pinpoint Weather           Medano Pass Road Current Conditions
